title: I don;t know how to resove this Error [Error 004]
body:
I have to make an Update to Lol but 66% is loaded and this error occurs, what should I do?

i'm new ,help please.

replies.body: This error can happen if your OS security settings are blocking your game files from getting read.  My suggestion would be to go over the steps in this [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore that access.  Let me know if you run into any issues with this, though!
